abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert performance by Metropolitan Opera Orchestra, led by their new principal conductor Fabio Luisi.
snippet: For Fabio Luisi, the principal conductor of the Met, the challenge is to maintain the level James Levine established, while moving his own interpretive personality into the spotlight.
lead_paragraph: For Fabio Luisi, the principal conductor of the Met, the challenge is to maintain the level James Levine established, while moving his own interpretive personality into the spotlight.

headline.main: Met Orchestra and New Chief, Out of the Pit
headline.print_headline: Met Orchestra And New Chief, Out of the Pit
headline.seo: Fabio Luisi With the Met Orchestra at Carnegie Hall - Review
